Fund Admin Manager Job at Volition Capital




        
    

        
        Volition Capital was set up to help the honest and hardworking to create wealth. We fulfill our mandate through investment education, cooperatives and partnerships with credible local and international investment companies. Our target audience is working professionals and retirees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fund Admin Manager

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)
Reporting Line: Chief Investment Officer

Roles & Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Validate Investment Management (IM) records from:
	Investment bookings
	Payment transactions
	Liquidations
	Payout figures
	Create accurate monthly payout forecasts
	Oversee implementation of booking and payout instructions
	Implement investment allocation instructions
	Validate investment returns on client dashboards and reports
	Flag reversals and failed payouts
	Perform client dashboard audits for congruence with offline records
	Prepare monthly and quarterly investment management reports


Experience And Qualifications


	A University Degree in a related field or equivalent certification.
	10+ years of experience in fund administration, investment operations, or a related field.
	Proven experience managing investment records.


Skill Sets, and Values:


	Obsessive attention to detail.
	High level of Math proficiency.
	Excellent use of Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets.
	Incredible drive and the ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Ability to manage complementary stakeholders.
	Strong problem-solving and process improvement mindset.
	Excellent communication and reporting skills.


Remuneration and Perks


	Competitive remuneration in line with industry benchmark
	Health Insurance
	Communication and transport allowances
	Birthday allowance
	Hybrid work options
	Staff-only investment opportunities
	High degree of autonomy & flexibility
	Global growth opportunities
